roleset.name: stay away from
roleset.note: AVOID-V NOTES: Member of Vncls avoid-52. (from avoid.01-v)

example.name: NP thing avoided
example.text: [She]-2 wanted *trace*-2 to avoid the morale-damaging public disclosure that a trial would bring.
example.arg: the morale-damaging public disclosure that a trial would bring.

example.name: S thing avoided
example.text: [Mr. Stoll]-1 wanted *trace-1* to avoid *trace-2* arousing suspicion.
